physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 15 x 20 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of matting: ''Picnic of Denver Newsboys, Donor Mrs. Rae Katz.''

mods.abstract: A group of men and boys pose for a photograph. There are pennants with ''News / Times'' on them and two boys are holding newspapers over their heads. A boy kneeling in front is holding a dog. Part of sign painted on an adjacent building can be seen. Many of the newsboys were from Jewish families who lived in the West Colfax neighborhood of Denver, Colorado.

titleInfo.title: Beck Archives Photograph Collection, Families and Groups
